segments.text: what shall we do after the volleyball match ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: how about going to the Olympic souvenir store to have a look ? I remember there is one in the gym .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's a good idea . I was thinking of buying some gifts for my family .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: me , too . What did you have in mind ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I haven't decided yet , but I think the Olympic Mascots are a must .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I agree . They're very lovely , especially " Huan Huan " .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: is that the red one ? That is my favorite , too . Do you know how much they are ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: the five dolls are sold together as a set , and they're priced according to the size . The bigger they are the more expensive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: oh , I see . If I buy more than a set , can I get any discount ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think so . All the souvenirs of the Olympic Games are very hot right now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: there are lots of things , such as postcards , key chains , posters and various arts and crafts .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it all sounds great . We can go there after the match . I can't wait to see what they have .
segments.speaker: S1
